I figured out a way to demonstrate how turbulence forms plastic concentration depth profiles in rivers. White plastic particles are more dense than water, blue are same density, green are less dense. Shake the jar to add turbulence and watch them form. #PlasticPollution https://t.co/DrKMcgUhdf

The Census Bureau prioritized publishing redistricting data as pipe-delimited, UTF-8 files that require a separate header file and are optimized for use in Access.
We still have a lot of work left to modernize open data standards.

"Come for the tool, stay for the network" is a key strategy for building marketplaces & platforms.

Israel, with its open data and 80% of adults vaccinated, is the Covid bellwether. With a population just one-third of Delhi state, it is reporting nearly 4,000 cases daily. Of the 400 "severe" cases there this month, 60% are among fully vaccinated people. https://t.co/HBuMRlf1FO
